localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Markup is a productivity tool for reading and annotating web content for personal knowledge growth. From highlighting and auto-summarizing key messages to synchronizing across your devices, Markup streamlines your reading habits.
blogPost.body: Markup is a productivity tool for reading and annotating web content for personal knowledge growth. From highlighting and auto-summarizing key messages to synchronizing across your devices, Markup streamlines your reading habits.
blogPost.title: Markup Extension By Kdan Mobile - Read, highlight and share what matters
blogPost.author: Vlad Shvets
